summary: I WOULD LIKE TO REGISTER A COMPLAINT ABOUT THE COIL PACK FAILURE ON MY 2000 VW JETTA - THIS IS A SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE THAT VW OF AMERICA REFUSES TO ADDRESS.  THIS COIL PACK FAILS AND CAUSES IMMEDIATE LOSS OF POWER IN THE ENGINE - I WAS DRIVING AND LOST POWER IN 2 OF THE 4 CYLINDERS.  VW DID NOT COVER MY REPLACEMENT.  THIS IS HAPPENING ON NUMEROUS VWS.  THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL - IT IS A DEFECT.
